      • newBuilder

        public static TriggeredCommandForm.Builder newBuilder(java.lang.String schemaName,
                                                      int schemaVersion,
                                                      java.util.List<Action> actions)
                                               throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Constructs a TriggeredCommandForm.Builder instance.
        Parameters:
        schemaName - name of schema. Must not be null or empty string.
        schemaVersion - version of schema.
        actions - List of actions. Must not be null or empty.
        Returns:
        builder instance.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - This exception is thrown if one or more following conditions are met.
        • schemaName is null or empty string.
        • actions is null or empty

      • newBuilderFromCommand

        public static TriggeredCommandForm.Builder newBuilderFromCommand(Command command)
                                                          throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Constructs a TriggeredCommandForm.Builder instance.

        This constructor copies following Command fields:

        • Command.getSchemaName()
        • Command.getSchemaVersion()
        • Command.getActions()
        • Command.getTargetID()
        • Command.getTitle()
        • Command.getDescription()
        • Command.getMetadata()
        Parameters:
        command - Souce of this TriggeredCommandForm.Builder instance.
        Returns:
        builder instance.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if command is null.

      • setTargetID

        public TriggeredCommandForm.Builder setTargetID(TypedID targetID)
                                         throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Setter of target thing ID.

        ThingIFAPI.postNewTrigger(TriggeredCommandForm, Predicate, TriggerOptions) and ThingIFAPI.patchTrigger(String, TriggeredCommandForm, Predicate, TriggerOptions) use TriggeredCommandForm.getTargetID() to specify target of command in trigger. If you do not set target thing ID with this method, Default target is used. The default target is ThingIFAPI.getTarget().

        If you create trigger which target of command is not default target, and update trigger with TriggeredCommandForm.getTargetID() as null, then, command target of updated trigger is changed to default target.

        Parameters:
        targetID - target thing ID.
        Returns:
        this instance for method chaining.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - type of targetID is not TypedID.Types#THING.

      • getTargetID

        public TypedID getTargetID()
        Getter of target thing ID.
        Returns:
        target thing ID
